resources.string: Used to display the app\'s service running state
Used to display campus network status or alerts
Used to update CA certificates in order for cURL to work
Used to listen network changes in order to perform Auto Login
Please complete both the username and the password
It seems your password has changed\nHead to Settings to enter the right credentials
Please enter the correct username or password
Unknown error: Please make sure you are connected to campus networks
You are out of balance\nPlease recharge your account
Enable Auto Login for campus networks

For devices running Android 7.0 or newer, the App needs "Location Permission" to listen Wi-Fi changes and has to show a persistent notification in order to automatically login campus networks when your Wi-Fi changes
Enabling Auto Login will require "Location Permission". Please grant the permission in the following system popup.
Are you sure you want to log out?
